mapper.sql: id, paramtypeid, paramtypename, paramkey, paramvalue, paramtext, usetype, state, createpersonid, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select:
select
from yxtc_framework_paraminfo where state='1'
and paramtypename like CONCAT('%','${paramtypename}','%' )
and paramvalue like CONCAT('%','${paramvalue}','%' )
order by paramtypeid,paramkey
limit ${startNum},${rows}

select count(1) as total from yxtc_framework_paraminfo u where state='1'
and paramtypename like CONCAT('%','${paramtypename}','%' )
and paramvalue like CONCAT('%','${paramvalue}','%' )
mapper.insert: insert into yxtc_framework_paraminfo (id, paramtypeid, paramtypename, paramkey, paramvalue, paramtext, usetype, state, createpersonid, createtime, updatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paramtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramtext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createpersonid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into yxtc_framework_paraminfo
id,
paramtypeid,
paramtypename,
paramkey,
paramvalue,
paramtext,
usetype,
state,

createtime,
updatetime,

mapper.update:
update yxtc_framework_paraminfo
paramtypeid = #{paramtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paramtypename = #{paramtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paramkey = #{paramkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paramvalue = #{paramvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paramtext = #{paramtext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usetype = #{usetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createpersonid = #{createpersonid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yxtc_framework_paraminfo set paramtypeid = #{paramtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paramtypename = #{paramtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paramkey = #{paramkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paramvalue = #{paramvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paramtext = #{paramtext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usetype = #{usetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createpersonid = #{createpersonid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
